logic.facade.list

Class FacadeManageWishList

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.facade.list.FacadeManageWishList

  • public class FacadeManageWishList
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a facade to manage all interactions with a wish list.

    loicd_000
